sentence: The  criticism  coming  from  South  America's  left-wing  governments  has  intensified  in  recent  days  as  thousands  of  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  Israeli  airstrikes  and  shelling,  according  to  health  officials  in  Gaza.

In  response,  Israel's  Foreign  Ministry  accused  Bolivia  of  "aligning  itself  with  the  Hamas  terrorist  organization"  that  killed  1,400  people  in  Israel  and  took  240  hostages  on  Oct.  7.
